page.description: Generate a SQL Create Database statement for the table passed in.
page.syntax: SQL_Statement as C = GenerateCreateDatabaseStatement as C (Database as C)

argument.name: SQL_Statement
argument.description: An add user group statement appropriate for the database.

argument.name: Database
argument.description: The name of the database to create.

page.discussion: The .GenerateCreateDatabaseStatement() method returns the SQL statement that create a database. Note: Not all databases vendors support creating a database through SQL.
